d:
In most of the Fire Emblem games since Fire Emmblem 6 (2001, GBA), the "Support System" is available as a way to explore more the depth of each playable character through the interaction between other few, selected characters.

This gallery is going to offer Illustrated Interpretations of every support between the characters from the following FE entries (only 1 between the C,B,A support levels):

FE6
FE7
FE8
FE9
FE12

The support system exists in latter games as well, but the writing is extremely subpar compared to the four aforementioned entries (too bad, because some of the characters are very interesting by themselves).

Supports will be in order of characters and entry.
n: [Misc] Fire Emblem Series - The Supports Illustrated [AI GENERATED]
